mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where ${searchkey} like #{keyword}
select n.f_idx, n.title, n.content, m.userid, n.view_cnt, n.write_date, n.update_date from notice n join member m on n.m_idx = m.m_idx where f_idx=#{f_idx}
select m_idx from member where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (f_idx, m_idx, title, content) values ((select nvl(max(f_idx)+1,1) from notice) ,#{m_idx}, #{title}, #{content})
